document_data.name: ''Laeral's Robes''
document_data.creator: [[Laeral Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Laeral's robes''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[robe]] that combined the [[magical]] effects of several items.
document_data.Description: A plethora of magical patterns resembling eyes adorned the robes.
document_data.Powers: ''Laeral's robes'' combined the effects of a ''[[robe of eyes]]'', a ''[[cloak of resistance]]'', and ''[[Heward's handy haversack]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners: This item was created and worn by [[Laeral Silverhand]].
